TopicTitle: How to remove decouplers from the staging part? and only have within action groups...

Articles.Content:
Gents,

Not sure if this is doable... but I have a moon base, and i have couplers for two small landers which i don't want as part of the main staging, but instead only have them part of a specific custom action group..

So the question if its possible how do you do it?
Well what I do is drag those couplers up into a new stage at the top of the stage list so they are out of the way, then assign them to action groups as normal

Don't think there is any way to remove things from staging entirely, but you could just have them in stage 0 with stage 1 being empty to provide a buffer. also Alt-L locks the staging so you can't activate a stage by accident.
Thats a pitty, atm i do as you mention and put them in stage 0.. though did not know the buffer trick or the ALT-L command.
